text.0: these morning sacrifices call you aśvins at the break of day.
text.1: for help have i invoked you rich in power and might for house by house ye visit all.
text.2: o heroes ye bestow wonderful nourishment send it to him whose songs are sweet.
text.3: accordant both of you drive your car down to us and drink the savoury soma juice.
text.4: approach ye and be near to us drink o ye aśvins of the meath.
text.5: draw forth the milk ye mighty rich in genuine wealth injure us not and come to us.
text.6: the horses that convey you in their rapid flight down to the worshippers abode.
text.7: with these your speedy coursers heroes aśvins come ye gods come wellinclined to us.
text.8: yea verily our princes seek the aśvins in pursuit of food.
text.9: these shall give lasting glory to our liberal lords and both nāsatyas shelter us.
text.10: those who have led the way like cars offending none those who are guardians of the men.
text.11: also through their own might the heroes have grown strong and dwell in safe and happy homes.
